document.full_text: with alex rodriguez sidelined by an injury, eric chavez went 2 for 4 and drove in the go-ahead run in the eighth-inning.
document.title: yankees 6, rangers 5: filling in at third base, chavez fuels win and lets rodriguez rest easy
lines_and_colors: with alex rodriguez sidelined by an injury, eric chavez went 2 for 4 and drove in the go-ahead run in the eighth-inning.
